contextual-insert-dedication--from-templ.label: t__Insert new topic
contextual-insert-dedication--from-templ.description: t__Create a new topic and insert it under the frontmatter or backmatter as a dedication.

contextual-insert-dedication--to-existin.label: t__Insert existing topic
contextual-insert-dedication--to-existin.description: t__Insert an existing topic under the frontmatter or backmatter as a dedication.

contextual-insert-dedication--placeholde.label: t__Insert as placeholder
contextual-insert-dedication--placeholde.description: t__Insert a dedication under the frontmatter or backmatter as a placeholder.
